desc: Slightly increases BB gauge after every turn

dictionary.lore: A shard of a manmade demonic stone said to be an imitation of the evil crystal known to be a source of demon powers. The completed demonic stone wasn't thought to be as powerful as the dreaded evil crystal, but it was destroyed anyway as it was seen as a threat to world peace. The researchers who created the stone all ended up dying strange mysterious deaths and it was rumored that their souls were taken by demons as a punishment for creating the demonic stone.

name: Demon Shard
